response.summary:
I am a detail-oriented person and have spent a few years in the area of software development. I have always chosen jobs that allow me to experiment safely with multiple technologies even if sometimes they are outside of my technical comfort-zone. This philosophy about technology allows me to keep a fresh outlook on the field.

This experimentation of technology doesn't stop at home. I am very proud of working at home in smart home improvements that require the set of skills I have earned throughout my carreer, but also recurring to things I wouldn't normally do, like electronics or carpentry. In the down times I am a fiction writer, although I do it as a hobby (never have had the chance to publish any story I have written). I am also a metal and videogames enthusiast.

I also speak English, Spanish and French fluently (moving slowly in German). And my social skills allow me to easily understand needs and solve problems (even in multi-cultural or multi-language contexts,  where there might exist many communication problems)

If you believe that I can be of help to you or your organization, don't hesitate to say "Hello!".
response.skills: User Interface Design, User Interface Programming, Python, Web Programming, Software Project Management, Project Management, Database Management, Android Development, Test Driven Development, Social Networking, Creative Writing, C#, Java, JavaScript, Git, C/C++, .NET Framework, Spring Framework, Node.js, Subversion

profile_positions.description:
Full time employment. Developer in C#, Java, Android SDK.

Important successes:
* Developping a suite of biometric applications for notarial offices (WebService, Client apps,
external API interaction, documents generation, external usb devices compatibility). Great Improvement in client satisfaction.
* Manager of customer support for Latam clients. Short waiting times for support as result.
* Localization of products from french/english to spanish.
* Creation of demo apps for electronic expos.
* Other commercial responsabilities (licence managing, hardware support managing).

Used Technologies: C#, Java, JavaScript, Vue.js, Node.js, Android SDK, HTML, CSS, Selenium, nUnit, WinForms, Apache Derby Embedded
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Technologies more often used: C#, .NET Framework, WinForms for UI development.
Full time employment. Developer in C#, ASP.Net MVC

Important successes:
* Started user experience initiative by implementing functional tests over the Web products.
* Responsable of the REST Services of the company.
* Helped in the design of HMI in their latest product (related to ETLs)

Used Technologies: C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Selenium, nUnit, NodeJS, ASP.Net MVC, ASP.Net Web API, WinForms, Oracle, SQL Server, jQuery.
profile_positions.title: Developer / UI Designer

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
